properties.description: This initiative includes policies that address a subset of the SWIFT Customer Security Program's Customer Security Controls Framework v2021 controls. Additional policies will be added in upcoming releases. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/swift2021-init.

metadata.displayName: Required retention period (days) for resource logs
Include AKS clusters when auditing if virtual machine scale set diagnostic logs are enabled
metadata.description: For more information, visit https://aka.ms/kubepolicydoc

metadata.displayName: Include Arc-connected servers when evaluating guest configuration policies
metadata.description: By selecting 'true,' you agree to be charged monthly per Arc connected machine; for more information, visit https://aka.ms/policy-pricing

metadata.displayName: Minimum TLS version for Windows web servers
metadata.description: Windows web servers with lower TLS versions will be assessed as non-compliant

metadata.displayName: Name of the resource group for Network Watcher
metadata.description: Name of the resource group where Network Watchers are located, Ex: NetworkWatcherRG

metadata.displayName: Required auditing setting for SQL servers
Optional: List of virtual machine images that have supported Linux OS to add to scope when evaluating if the Log Analytics extension is installed
Optional: List of virtual machine images that have supported Windows OS to add to scope when evaluating if the Log Analytics extension is installed
Windows certificate store path to check for expiring certificates
metadata.description: The path to the certificate store containing the certificates to check the expiration dates of. Default value is 'Cert:' which is the root certificate store path, so all certificates on the machine will be checked. Other example paths: 'Cert:\LocalMachine', 'Cert:\LocalMachine\TrustedPublisher', 'Cert:\CurrentUser'

metadata.displayName: Certificate thumbprints to exclude when checking for expiring certificates
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of certificate thumbprints to ignore. e.g. THUMBPRINT1;THUMBPRINT2;THUMBPRINT3

metadata.displayName: Certificate thumbprints to include when checking for expiring certificates
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of certificate thumbprints to check under the specified path. If a value is not specified, all certificates under the certificate store path will be checked. If a value is specified, no certificates other than those with the thumbprints specified will be checked. e.g. THUMBPRINT1;THUMBPRINT2;THUMBPRINT3

metadata.displayName: Expiration limit (days) for certificate expiration
metadata.description: An integer indicating the number of days within which to check for certificates that are expiring. For example, if this value is 30, any certificate expiring within the next 30 days will cause this policy to be non-compliant.

metadata.displayName: Include expired certificates as 'expiring' when checking for expiring certificates
metadata.description: Must be 'true' or 'false'. True indicates that any found certificates that have already expired will also make this policy non-compliant. False indicates that certificates that have expired will be be ignored.

metadata.displayName: Kubernetes namespaces excluded from evaluation of Kubernetes cluster policies in this initiative
metadata.description: List of Kubernetes namespaces to exclude from policy evaluation

metadata.displayName: Kubernetes namespaces included for evaluation of Kubernetes cluster policies in this initiative
metadata.description: List of Kubernetes namespaces to (only) include for policy evaluation; an empty list will result in policies evaluated on all resources in all namespaces

metadata.displayName: Kubernetes label selector for resources included for evaluation of Kubernetes cluster policies in this initiative
metadata.description: Label query to select Kubernetes resources to include for policy evaluation; an empty label selector will result in policies evaluated on all Kubernetes resources

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: VM Image Builder templates should use private link
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure Key Vault should disable public network access
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Deprecated effect for policy: Private endpoint should be configured for Key Vault
metadata.description: The Deny effect has been deprecated for this policy given that the simultaneous creation of a Key Vault and its associated private endpoint is not possible. Therefore, Deny prevents the creation of any new Key Vault.

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure Key Vaults should use private link
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Kubernetes clusters should be accessible only over HTTPS
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Automation account variables should be encrypted

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Only secure connections to your Azure Cache for Redis should be enabled

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure SQL Database should be running TLS version 1.2 or newer

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Public network access on Azure SQL Database should be disabled

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Service Fabric clusters should only use Azure Active Directory for client authentication
